title: New Book: Saints Preserved: An Encyclopedia of Relics including the Shroud of Turin
post: Merriam-Webster lets people suggest new words to include in the dictionary. I just submitted the word “sindonolgy.” My reference was Dictionary.com which defines it as the scientific study of the Shroud of Turin. Merriam-Webster is the standard reference for writers and copy editors in the U.S.
author: David Roemer
